class.rdfs:comment: A part of a successively published publication such as a periodical or publication volume, often numbered, usually containing a grouping of works such as articles.\n\nSee also [blog post](http://blog.schema.org/2014/09/schemaorg-support-for-bibliographic_2.html).
class.rdfs:label: PublicationIssue

schema:issueNumber.rdfs:comment: Identifies the issue of publication; for example, "iii" or "2".
schema:issueNumber.rdfs:label: issueNumber

schema:pageEnd.rdfs:comment: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".
schema:pageEnd.rdfs:label: pageEnd

schema:pageStart.rdfs:comment: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".
schema:pageStart.rdfs:label: pageStart

schema:pagination.rdfs:comment: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd; for example, "1-6, 9, 55" or "10-12, 46-49".
schema:pagination.rdfs:label: pagination
